response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and rarity, it's worth noting that this product holds a significant significance to me, which is why I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price. Considering its worth to you, I propose to sell it to you for $950,000. This offer represents a fair compromise between the intrinsic value of the product and my desire to ensure it reaches someone who appreciates it as much as I do. I trust that this proposal will be mutually beneficial. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
